tool_description: Maps equipment deployment and positioning throughout wedding event timeline, ensuring optimal gear placement for each ceremony phase.

event_schedule.description: Event timeline with times and activities (e.g., '14:00-Ceremony', '15:30-Cocktails')

venue_layout.description: Venue areas and their characteristics (altar, aisle, reception_hall, garden)

photography_priorities.description: Key moments to capture (processional, vows, first_dance, cake_cutting)

equipment_categories.description: Equipment categories to map (cameras, lighting, audio, video, accessories)

setup_crew_size.description: Number of people available for equipment setup and moves

transition_time.description: Minutes available for equipment transitions between events

error_messages: Invalid event schedule format: Use format 'HH:MM-Activity' for each timeline entry.
Empty venue layout: Provide at least one venue area description.
No photography priorities: Specify at least one key moment to capture.
Empty equipment categories: Provide at least one equipment category.
Invalid mobility preference: Use minimal_moves, balanced, or maximum_coverage.
Invalid crew size: Setup crew size must be between 1 and 10 people.
Invalid transition time: Transition time must be between 5 and 60 minutes.
usage: Input the event schedule, venue layout, photography priorities, and equipment categories. Adjust mobility preferences, crew size, and transition times as needed. The tool will create an equipment deployment timeline.

deployment_timeline.description: Timeline showing when and where to position equipment

equipment_moves.description: Required equipment relocations during the event

setup_checklist.description: Pre-event setup tasks organized by priority and timing

contingency_plans.description: Backup plans for equipment positioning if schedule changes
